price: Nokorε sε, εberε a Nyankopͻn akoa (Muhammad) gyina hͻ rebͻ mpae sufrε no no, εkaa kakraabi sε anka (Jinnfoͻ no) kͻkyere guu no so wͻ akͻnkͻn so.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدۡعُوهُ كَادُواْ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِ لِبَدٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu lammā qāma ʿabdu al-lahi yadʿūhu kādū yakūnūna ʿalayhi libadan
